changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `immunization_stockout` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `drug_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `remarks` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `date_depleted` datetime NOT NULL, `date_restocked` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_immunization_stockout_inventory_drug_idx` (`drug_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_immunization_stockout_inventory_drug` FOREIGN KEY (`drug_id`) REFERENCES `inventory_drug` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `immunization_equipment` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `equipment_type` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `model` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `working_status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, `energy_source` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `created_on` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `remarks` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `date_of_manufacture` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `immunization_store_patient_transaction` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `patient_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `immunization_state` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `immunization_store_drug_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `vvm_stage` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `quantity` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_on` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `remark` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_person1_idx` (`created_by`), KEY `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_patient1_idx` (`patient_id`), KEY `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_immunization__idx1` (`immunization_store_drug_id`), KEY `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_state1_idx` (`immunization_state`), CONSTRAINT `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_immunization_st2` FOREIGN KEY (`immunization_store_drug_id`) REFERENCES `immunization_store_drug` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_patient1` FOREIGN KEY (`patient_id`) REFERENCES `patient` (`patient_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_person1` FOREIGN KEY (`created_by`) REFERENCES `person` (`person_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_immunization_store_patient_transaction_state1` FOREIGN KEY (`immunization_state`) REFERENCES `patient_state` (`patient_state_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
